pattern.name: Integral
pattern.description: The integral (area under curve) is computed with the trapezoidal rule as described at: http://www.lexjansen.com/wuss/2004/posters/c_post_the_sas_calculations_.pdf
pattern.example: Civilisation's score from Civilization III (a computer game).
pattern.author: Jan Motl
pattern.code: WITH intermediate AS ( SELECT @base , @numericalColumn nowValue , @temporalColumn nowTime , LAG(@numericalColumn) OVER (PARTITION BY @basePartitionBy ORDER BY @temporalColumn) AS lagValue , LAG(@temporalColumn) OVER (PARTITION BY @basePartitionBy ORDER BY @temporalColumn) AS lagTime FROM @propagatedTable ) SELECT @base , sum((nowValue + lagValue) * (nowTime - lagTime) / 2) AS @columnName FROM intermediate GROUP BY @base
